scripts.say: Commander, you’re petting me so much...
{namecode:98} is busy ya know! She doesn’t have time to play with you Commander!
Since the Commander is so idle, then come help {namecode:98}!
Great timing, the inventory will soon run out... come quick and help me collect all these materials!
Cheering for ya, Commander! {namecode:98} believes in you, nyaa!
